sentence: Some  of  those  men,  after  returning  to  Gaza,  told  NPR  they  had  been  rounded  up  across  Israel  by  the  country's  security  forces  and  detained  following  the  Oct.  7  Hamas  attack,  when  militants  stormed  into  Israel,  killing  around  1,400  people  and  taking  an  estimated  240  hostages,  according  to  Israeli  officials.
Israel's  attacks  on  the  Gaza  Strip  since  Oct.  7  have  killed  more  than  9,000  people,  70%  of  them  women  and  children,  according  to  Palestinian  health  officials.
